(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (ADVP (RB ,))))


root(ROOT-0, Now-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADJP (JJ sure)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (NN everyone))
            (ADVP (RB here))
            (VP (VBZ knows)
              (PP (IN about)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP Hungrygowhere) (NN website) (NN right))))))))
    (. ?)))


nsubj(sure-3, I-1)
cop(sure-3, am-2)
root(ROOT-0, sure-3)
nsubj(knows-6, everyone-4)
advmod(knows-6, here-5)
ccomp(sure-3, knows-6)
prep(knows-6, about-7)
det(right-11, the-8)
nn(right-11, Hungrygowhere-9)
nn(right-11, website-10)
pobj(about-7, right-11)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Well))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Well-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD had)
      (NP (DT the) (NN opportunity)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB work)
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS boys))
                  (PP (IN from)
                    (NP (NNP Hungrygowhere)))))
              (PP
                (ADVP (RB recently))
                (IN on)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP Heritage) (NNPS Hawkers) (NN project))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(had-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, had-2)
det(opportunity-4, the-3)
dobj(had-2, opportunity-4)
aux(work-6, to-5)
infmod(opportunity-4, work-6)
prep(work-6, with-7)
det(boys-9, the-8)
pobj(with-7, boys-9)
prep(boys-9, from-10)
pobj(from-10, Hungrygowhere-11)
advmod(on-13, recently-12)
prep(work-6, on-13)
det(project-17, the-14)
nn(project-17, Heritage-15)
nn(project-17, Hawkers-16)
pobj(on-13, project-17)


(ROOT
  (PP (IN During)
    (NP
      (NP (CD one))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (PRP$ our) (NN lunch) (NNS sessions))))))


root(ROOT-0, During-1)
pobj(During-1, one-2)
prep(one-2, of-3)
poss(sessions-6, our-4)
nn(sessions-6, lunch-5)
pobj(of-3, sessions-6)


(ROOT
  (SINV
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP
      (ADVP (RB casually))
      (VBN asked)
      (S
        (VP (NNP Hoongy)
          (NP (DT the) (NN $)))))))


nsubj(asked-3, I-1)
advmod(asked-3, casually-2)
root(ROOT-0, asked-3)
dep($-6, Hoongy-4)
det($-6, the-5)
ccomp(asked-3, $-6)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (CD 64K) (NN question))
    (: :)))


num(question-2, 64K-1)
root(ROOT-0, question-2)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN ``)
      (NP (NNP Ay)))
    (, ,)))


pobj(``-1, Ay-2)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN so)
    (S
      (VP (VBP tell)
        (NP (PRP me)))
      (, ,))))


mark(tell-2, so-1)
root(ROOT-0, tell-2)
dobj(tell-2, me-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP 've)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBG eating)
          (PP (IN at)
            (NP
              (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (JJS best) (NNS restaurants))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (NNP Singapore)))))
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (RB almost) (CD two) (NNS years))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(eating-4, you-1)
aux(eating-4, 've-2)
aux(eating-4, been-3)
root(ROOT-0, eating-4)
prep(eating-4, at-5)
predet(restaurants-9, all-6)
det(restaurants-9, the-7)
amod(restaurants-9, best-8)
pobj(at-5, restaurants-9)
prep(restaurants-9, in-10)
pobj(in-10, Singapore-11)
prep(eating-4, for-12)
advmod(years-15, almost-13)
num(years-15, two-14)
pobj(for-12, years-15)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADJP (RB Hungry) (JJ REALLY))
    (S
      (VP (VB Go)
        (FRAG
          (WHADVP (WRB Where)))))
    (. ?)))


advmod(REALLY-2, Hungry-1)
root(ROOT-0, REALLY-2)
dep(REALLY-2, Go-3)
dep(Go-3, Where-4)


(ROOT
  (INTJ (UH '')))
